svg.text: Figure 2: Adaptive Resource Management Engine - Real-Time Optimization Flow

g.text: • Historical usage pattern analysis with trend identification
• Predictive modeling using machine learning algorithms
1. Maximize Security Level: Highest cryptographic strength within constraints
2. Minimize Power Consumption: Extend operational lifetime
3. Optimize Response Time: Maintain system responsiveness
Security Level: Post-Quantum Level 2 | Projected Battery: 52.4h

svg.text: → Reduce to Level 1 security, extend lifetime to 12+ hours
→ Upgrade to Level 3 security, enable advanced monitoring
• 75% reduction in power consumption vs. static protocols
• Average adaptation time: <150ms for configuration changes
Resource Optimization: 70-90% reduction vs standard implementations | Power Efficiency: <50µJ (Level 1) to <2mJ (Level 4) per operation
Adaptation Speed: <150ms configuration changes | Memory Footprint: 32KB-2MB depending on security level
Security Coverage: Full post-quantum protection | Compatibility: 8-bit to 64-bit processors, all major IoT networks
